headline.print_headline: Dressing the VA's Wounds: What Obama Faces Now
headline.main: Dressing the VA's Wounds: What Obama Faces Now

lead_paragraph: When U.S. President Barack Obama accepted the resignation on Friday of Veterans Affairs Secretary Eric Shinseki, he said his priority now was fixing the troubled agency whose officials are accused of covering up delays in providing healthcare for U.S. veterans.
